QuestData.Title: No Goblin Left Behind
QuestData.Description: Our mission is dead in the water unless we move fast!$b$bI've found the perfect spot for a new base. While I secure the location, I need you to rescue the team and bring them back. We've trained for this a million times. Just direct them toward the rendezvous point and they'll find the way.$b$bWe don't have much time, let's go!
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate and rescue the missing members of the Gob Squad.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet with Patch at the Forlorn Ruins.
